alert.note: Alert for Presidio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 28 at 12:59AM CDT until May 28 at 2:14PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Midland/Odessa TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Rio Grande at Presidio International Bridge affecting Presidio County. Rio Grande below Presidio 5SE affecting Presidio County. For the Rio Grande...including Presidio 6WNW, Presidio International Bridge, Presidio 5SE, Castolon, Johnson Ranch, Boquillas, Dryden 16S, Terlingua 8S...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rio Grande below Presidio 5SE. * WHEN...From early this morning to this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet (2.7 meters), the river reaches minor flood stage, and low lying areas begin to flood. At 11.0 feet (3.4 meters), minor flooding continues along the river. Irrigation pumps may need to be removed. No threats to residences or other structures are known to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 10.8 feet (3.3 meters). - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:15 AM CDT Sunday was 12.4 feet (3.8 meters). - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early this morning and continue falling to 3.1 feet (0.9 meters) late Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet (2.7 meters). - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.1 feet (2.8 meters) on 09/22/2022. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and forecasts (feet): Fld Observed Sun Sun Sun Mon Location Stg Stg Day/Time 7am 1pm 7pm 1am Rio Grande Presidio 5SE 9.0 10.8 Sun 12am 5.7 4.6 4.3 3.8 Below are the latest river stages and forecasts (meters): Fld Observed Sun Sun Sun Mon Location Stg Stg Day/Time 7am 1pm 7pm 1am Rio Grande Presidio 5SE 2.7 3.3 Sun 12am 1.7 1.4 1.3 1.2 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 100 PM CDT.
